commit.message:
configure.in (auto-build.h): Use target_alias and build_alias when running configure.

	* configure.in (auto-build.h): Use target_alias and build_alias
	when running configure.
	(gcc_cv_as, gcc_cv_ld): Search install paths when build != host too.
	(gcc_cv_nm, gcc_cv_objdump): Set for build != host too.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r52020

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,11 @@
+2002-04-08  Alan Modra  <amodra@bigpond.net.au>
+
+	* configure.in (auto-build.h): Use target_alias and build_alias
+	when running configure.
+	(gcc_cv_as, gcc_cv_ld): Search install paths when build != host too.
+	(gcc_cv_nm, gcc_cv_objdump): Set for build != host too.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
 2002-04-07  David S. Miller  <davem@redhat.com>
 
 	* config.gcc (sparc64-*-linux*): Add t-crtfm to tmake_file.

@@ -2229,7 +2229,7 @@ EOF
 fi
 
 # Find some useful tools
-for ac_prog in mawk gawk nawk awk
+for ac_prog in gawk mawk nawk awk
 do
 # Extract the first word of "$ac_prog", so it can be a program name with args.
 set dummy $ac_prog; ac_word=$2
@@ -5093,7 +5093,7 @@ else
 	saved_CFLAGS="${CFLAGS}"
 	CC="${CC_FOR_BUILD}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS_FOR_BUILD}" \
 	${realsrcdir}/configure \
-		--target=$target --host=$build --build=$build
+		--target=$target_alias --host=$build_alias --build=$build_alias
 	CFLAGS="${saved_CFLAGS}"
 
 	# We just finished tests for the build machine, so rename
@@ -6870,7 +6870,7 @@ elif test -f $gcc_cv_as_gas_srcdir/configure.in -a -f ../gas/Makefile; then
 	gcc_cv_gas_minor_version=`expr "$gcc_cv_gas_version" : "VERSION=[0-9]*\.\([0-9]*\)"`
 fi
 
-if test "x$gcc_cv_as" = x -a x$build = x$host; then
+if test "x$gcc_cv_as" = x; then
 	# Search the same directories that the installed compiler will
 	# search.  Else we may find the wrong assembler and lose.  If we
 	# do not find a suitable assembler binary, then try the user's
@@ -6963,7 +6963,7 @@ elif test -f $gcc_cv_ld_gld_srcdir/configure.in -a -f ../ld/Makefile; then
 	gcc_cv_gld_minor_version=`expr "$gcc_cv_gld_version" : "VERSION=[0-9]*\.\([0-9]*\)"`
 fi
 
-if test "x$gcc_cv_ld" = x -a x$build = x$host; then
+if test "x$gcc_cv_ld" = x; then
 	# Search the same directories that the installed compiler will
 	# search.  Else we may find the wrong linker and lose.  If we
 	# do not find a suitable linker binary, then try the user's
@@ -7033,32 +7033,28 @@ echo $ac_n "checking what nm to use""... $ac_c" 1>&6
 echo "configure:7034: checking what nm to use" >&5
 if test -x nm$host_exeext; then
 	gcc_cv_nm=./nm$host_exeext
-elif test x$build = x$host; then
-	if test "x$program_prefix" != xNONE; then
-		gcc_cv_nm=${program_prefix}nm$host_exeext
-	else
-		gcc_cv_nm=`echo nm | sed ${program_transform_name}`$host_exeext
-	fi
+elif test "x$program_prefix" != xNONE; then
+	gcc_cv_nm=${program_prefix}nm$host_exeext
+else
+	gcc_cv_nm=`echo nm | sed ${program_transform_name}`$host_exeext
 fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_nm" 1>&6
 
 # Figure out what objdump we will be using.
 echo $ac_n "checking what objdump to use""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7048: checking what objdump to use" >&5
+echo "configure:7046: checking what objdump to use" >&5
 if test -x objdump$host_exeext; then
 	gcc_cv_objdump=./objdump$host_exeext
-elif test x$build = x$host; then
-	if test "x$program_prefix" != xNONE; then
-		gcc_cv_objdump=${program_prefix}objdump$host_exeext
-	else
-		gcc_cv_objdump=`echo objdump | sed ${program_transform_name}`$host_exeext
-	fi
+elif test "x$program_prefix" != xNONE; then
+	gcc_cv_objdump=${program_prefix}objdump$host_exeext
+else
+	gcc_cv_objdump=`echo objdump | sed ${program_transform_name}`$host_exeext
 fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_objdump" 1>&6
 
 # Figure out what assembler alignment features are present.
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler alignment features""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7062: checking assembler alignment features" >&5
+echo "configure:7058: checking assembler alignment features" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_alignment_features=none
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
 	# Gas version 2.6 and later support for .balign and .p2align.
@@ -7106,7 +7102,7 @@ fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_as_alignment_features" 1>&6
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler subsection support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7110: checking assembler subsection support" >&5
+echo "configure:7106: checking assembler subsection support" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_subsections=no
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
   if test "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -eq 2 -a "$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version" -ge 9 -o "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -gt 2 && grep 'obj_format = elf' ../gas/Makefile > /dev/null; then
@@ -7146,7 +7142,7 @@ fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_as_subsections" 1>&6
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler weak support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7150: checking assembler weak support" >&5
+echo "configure:7146: checking assembler weak support" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_weak=no
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
   if test "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -eq 2 -a "$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version" -ge 2 -o "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -gt 2; then
@@ -7169,7 +7165,7 @@ fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_as_weak" 1>&6
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler hidden support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7173: checking assembler hidden support" >&5
+echo "configure:7169: checking assembler hidden support" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_hidden=no
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
   if test "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -eq 2 -a "$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version" -ge 10 -o "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -gt 2 && grep 'obj_format = elf' ../gas/Makefile > /dev/null; then
@@ -7195,7 +7191,7 @@ libgcc_visibility=$gcc_cv_as_hidden
 
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler leb128 support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7199: checking assembler leb128 support" >&5
+echo "configure:7195: checking assembler leb128 support" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_leb128=no
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
   if test "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -eq 2 -a "$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version" -ge 11 -o "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -gt 2 && grep 'obj_format = elf' ../gas/Makefile > /dev/null; then
@@ -7240,7 +7236,7 @@ fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_as_leb128" 1>&6
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler eh_frame optimization""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7244: checking assembler eh_frame optimization" >&5
+echo "configure:7240: checking assembler eh_frame optimization" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_eh_frame=no
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
   if test "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -eq 2 -a "$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version" -ge 12 -o "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -gt 2 && grep 'obj_format = elf' ../gas/Makefile > /dev/null; then
@@ -7321,7 +7317,7 @@ fi
 echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_as_eh_frame" 1>&6
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler section merging support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7325: checking assembler section merging support" >&5
+echo "configure:7321: checking assembler section merging support" >&5
 gcc_cv_as_shf_merge=no
 if test x$gcc_cv_gas_major_version != x -a x$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version != x; then
   if test "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -eq 2 -a "$gcc_cv_gas_minor_version" -ge 12 -o "$gcc_cv_gas_major_version" -gt 2 && grep 'obj_format = elf' ../gas/Makefile > /dev/null; then
@@ -7347,7 +7343,7 @@ case "$target" in
   # All TARGET_ABI_OSF targets.
   alpha*-*-osf* | alpha*-*-linux* | alpha*-*-*bsd*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler supports explicit relocations""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7351: checking assembler supports explicit relocations" >&5
+echo "configure:7347: checking assembler supports explicit relocations" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_explicit_relocs'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7397,7 +7393,7 @@ EOF
     ;;
   sparc*-*-*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler .register pseudo-op support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7401: checking assembler .register pseudo-op support" >&5
+echo "configure:7397: checking assembler .register pseudo-op support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_register_pseudo_op'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7425,7 +7421,7 @@ EOF
     fi
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler supports -relax""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7429: checking assembler supports -relax" >&5
+echo "configure:7425: checking assembler supports -relax" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_relax_opt'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7453,7 +7449,7 @@ EOF
     fi
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler and linker support unaligned pc related relocs""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7457: checking assembler and linker support unaligned pc related relocs" >&5
+echo "configure:7453: checking assembler and linker support unaligned pc related relocs" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_sparc_ua_pcrel'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7479,8 +7475,8 @@ EOF
 
     fi
 
-    echo $ac_n "checking assembler and linker support unaligned pc related relocs against hidden symbols""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7484: checking assembler and linker support unaligned pc related relocs against hidden symbols" >&5
+    echo $ac_n "checking assembler and linker support unaligned pc related relocs against hidden AC_ACVERSION,AC_AIX,AC_ALLOCA,AC_ARG_ARRAY,AC_ARG_ENABLE,AC_ARG_PROGRAM,AC_ARG_WITH,AC_BEFORE,AC_CACHE_CHECK,AC_CACHE_LOAD,AC_CACHE_SAVE,AC_CACHE_VAL,AC_CANONICAL_BUILD,AC_CANONICAL_HOST,AC_CANONICAL_SYSTEM,AC_CANONICAL_TARGET,AC_CHAR_UNSIGNED,AC_CHECKING,AC_CHECK_FILE,AC_CHECK_FILES,AC_CHECK_FUNC,AC_CHECK_FUNCS,AC_CHECK_HEADER,AC_CHECK_HEADERS,AC_CHECK_HEADERS_DIRENT,AC_CHECK_HEADER_DIRENT,AC_CHECK_LIB,AC_CHECK_PROG,AC_CHECK_PROGS,AC_CHECK_SIZEOF,AC_CHECK_TOOL,AC_CHECK_TOOL_PREFIX,AC_CHECK_TYPE,AC_COMPILE_CHECK,AC_CONFIG_AUX_DIR,AC_CONFIG_AUX_DIRS,AC_CONFIG_AUX_DIR_DEFAULT,AC_CONFIG_HEADER,AC_CONFIG_SUBDIRS,AC_CONST,AC_CROSS_CHECK,AC_CYGWIN,AC_CYGWIN32,AC_C_BIGENDIAN,AC_C_CHAR_UNSIGNED,AC_C_CONST,AC_C_CROSS,AC_C_INLINE,AC_C_LONG_DOUBLE,AC_C_STRINGIZE,AC_DECL_SYS_SIGLIST,AC_DECL_YYTEXT,AC_DEFINE,AC_DEFINE_UNQUOTED,AC_DEFUN,AC_DIR_HEADER,AC_DIVERSION_CMDS,AC_DIVERSION_CURRENT,AC_DIVERSION_ICMDS,AC_DIVERSION_INIT,AC_DIVERSION_NORMAL,AC_DIVERSION_NORMAL_1,AC_DIVERSION_NORMAL_2,AC_DIVERSION_NORMAL_3,AC_DIVERSION_NORMAL_4,AC_DIVERSION_NOTICE,AC_DIVERSION_SED,AC_DIVERT_POP,AC_DIVERT_PUSH,AC_DYNIX_SEQ,AC_EGREP_CPP,AC_EGREP_HEADER,AC_ENABLE,AC_EPI,AC_ERROR,AC_EXEEXT,AC_F77_LIBRARY_LDFLAGS,AC_FD_CC,AC_FD_MSG,AC_FIND_X,AC_FIND_XTRA,AC_FUNC_ALLOCA,AC_FUNC_CHECK,AC_FUNC_CLOSEDIR_VOID,AC_FUNC_FNMATCH,AC_FUNC_GETLOADAVG,AC_FUNC_GETMNTENT,AC_FUNC_GETPGRP,AC_FUNC_MEMCMP,AC_FUNC_MMAP,AC_FUNC_MMAP_ANYWHERE,AC_FUNC_MMAP_FILE,AC_FUNC_SELECT_ARGTYPES,AC_FUNC_SETPGRP,AC_FUNC_SETVBUF_REVERSED,AC_FUNC_STRCOLL,AC_FUNC_STRFTIME,AC_FUNC_UTIME_NULL,AC_FUNC_VFORK,AC_FUNC_VPRINTF,AC_FUNC_WAIT3,AC_GCC_TRADITIONAL,AC_GETGROUPS_T,AC_GETLOADAVG,AC_HAVE_FUNCS,AC_HAVE_HEADERS,AC_HAVE_LIBRARY,AC_HAVE_POUNDBANG,AC_HEADER_CHECK,AC_HEADER_DIRENT,AC_HEADER_EGREP,AC_HEADER_MAJOR,AC_HEADER_STAT,AC_HEADER_STDC,AC_HEADER_SYS_WAIT,AC_HEADER_TIME,AC_INIT,AC_INIT_BINSH,AC_INIT_NOTICE,AC_INIT_PARSE_ARGS,AC_INIT_PREPARE,AC_INLINE,AC_INT_16_BITS,AC_IRIX_SUN,AC_ISC_POSIX,AC_LANG,AC_LANG_C,AC_LANG_CPLUSPLUS,AC_LANG_FO
